comments.content: retarted just a waste of  time
this game is a really annoying and uneeded star trek game that proves, NOTHING. your better off buying a puzzle book at the store for 5 bucks. 2/10

It was really fun at first, but then I got to the second game and I got 4 of the differences, but I couldnt find the last one, I clicked all over the picture. Nothing. I think this game has a glitch. I give it a 2/10.

It was really fun at first, but then I got to the second game and I got 4 of the differences, but I couldnt find the last one, I clicked all over the picture. Nothing. I think this game has a glitch. I give it a 2/10.
omg if star trek could see this i think it wud have curled dem up into a lil ball n cried, this has to be one of the stupidest! dumbest! and most ignorant games i have played on this website!
